 
mean of X(mu_FF5): 
      MKTRF         SMB         HML         RMW         CMA 
0.006202551 0.002320000 0.003316735 0.002946769 0.002972449 

cov of X(cov_FF51):
              MKTRF           SMB           HML           RMW           CMA
MKTRF  0.0021004158  3.479298e-04 -3.121675e-04 -0.0002219358 -3.414516e-04
SMB    0.0003479298  7.317265e-04 -3.973719e-06 -0.0002660769 -1.690997e-05
HML   -0.0003121675 -3.973719e-06  7.319808e-04  0.0001126344  2.343974e-04
RMW   -0.0002219358 -2.660769e-04  1.126344e-04  0.0005384921  2.708390e-05
CMA   -0.0003414516 -1.690997e-05  2.343974e-04  0.0000270839  3.790765e-04

mean of B(mu1):

-0.04296965 -0.05319382  0.05179562  0.22418528  0.28688516 

cov of B(cov1):

0.04387196  0.03623135  0.01680922 -0.036509149 -0.021800369
0.03623135  0.13366785  0.05451927 -0.072002762 -0.014991057
0.01680922  0.05451927  0.19416160 -0.029036319  0.018645837
-0.03650915 -0.07200276 -0.02903632  0.170151266 -0.003950417
-0.02180037 -0.01499106  0.01864584 -0.003950417  0.122590667

standard deviation of noise(mu_error):

0.04144858

###################R#################
k=5
p=25
n=600
X = rmvnorm(n,mu_FF5,cov_FF51)
BT = rmvnorm(p-k, mu1, cov1)
for (m in 1:(p-k)) {
    BT[m,] = BT[m,]/sqrt(m)
  }
Y = X %*% t(BT) + matrix(rnorm(n*(p-k)),n,(p-k))*sqrt(mu_error)
